name: Spiders and Sports and Plane Crashes
name_original: Spiders and Sports and Plane Crashes
description:
Made for my first Ludum Dare (46). The theme: Keep it alive.

So I thought about the movie IT, and I thought about the movie Alive. And I made this.

All done in under 48 hours, everything created from scratch over that time. Software used: Construct 2, Inkscape, Krita, Music Maker, Audacity.

WASD controls, use the mouse to aim and launch the soccer ball. Stand over the wreckage to increase your (RED) heat bar, and collect Turkeys (GREEN) to give yourself the calories needed to escape the Andes.
